segments.text: How can anyone be so utterly blind to their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is practically a waterfall, and she's just drying a plate!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a complete disregard for the house and the resources.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman should be paying more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And now look at these children, causing more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is clearly unstable; he's going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just openly stealing cookies, right behind her back!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation screams of negligence and a lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess, the wasted water, the potential injuries â€“ it's all so preventable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of frustration just watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before this gets even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the serene garden outside just makes it more galling.
segments.speaker: PAR
